column4: I just checked my disk space usage, and in /var/log there are 3 files that take 3.6 gigs each, anyone know what they are? kem.log.0, syslog.0, messages.0
have you not restarted your computer in 5 years? lol thats insane.
well, in a couple of weeks or so
that should be cleared out each reboot i think.
